text: Answer: (b) Solution: S N [ S B LB O B o N G e | e T [9 | ke bl | Mutual Exclusion is not possible in the above if we execute 1565257535854 -59 Then both the process would be able to enter the critical section as swap is not atomic. The progress is possible as any process can enter the CS independent of each other. Bounded wait is not possible as a process can enter the CS again after it just comes out of the CS.
